start: Welcome to AnonIndoChat! Your friendly chat bot for meeting new people. Please choose your language:
profile_complete: Profile setup complete. You're ready to chat!
searching_partner: We're looking for someone special for you... Please hang tight while we find your match!
no_partner_found: No partners available now. Try again later.
blocked: You are blocked. Please contact support for assistance.
profile_setup: Set up your profile to get started.
profile_setup_required: Please complete your profile first before you can start chatting!
profile_saved: Profile saved! You can now start chatting.
match_found: Awesome! We've found a chat partner for you. Say hello and enjoy your conversation!
pool_wait: You've been added to the matchmaking pool. We'll notify you as soon as a suitable person is found.
not_in_room: You're not currently in a chat. Use /find to connect with someone new!
end_chat: You've left the chat. Remember, you can always use /find to meet someone new!
partner_left: Your chat partner has left the chat. Use /find to meet someone new.
blocked_word: Please avoid using inappropriate words. Let's keep our community welcoming for everyone.
rate_limit: Please wait a moment before sending another message.
chat_error: Chat room error. Please use /find again.
upgrade_tip:
To upgrade to premium:

1. pay 9.99 USD to get 90 days of premium to: PAYEER: P1060900640
2. Upload payment proof (photo, screenshot, or document) here.
3. Our team will review and activate your membership ASAP.

Thank you for your supporting
proof_sent: Proof sent for review. Our team will get back to you soon.
premium_only: This feature is available to premium members. Upgrade to premium for full access!
premium_until: You are a premium member until {expiry}
report_sent: Report sent to admin. Thank you for helping keep our platform safe.
filters_saved: Your filters have been saved! Use /find to start searching using your new filters.
filter_info: Click on each option to change it, then Save.
already_in_room: You are already in a chat. Use /end or /next to leave first.
already_searching: You are already searching for a partner. Please wait or cancel your search.
unknown_option: Unknown menu option. Please try again.
search_cancelled: Search cancelled. Use /find to search again.
policy_no_links: Links and Telegram bot usernames are not allowed. This is against bot policy.
policy_blocked: You have violated the bot policy multiple times. Admin has been notified.
premium_expired_info: To continue enjoying premium features, please renew your subscription.
referral_step3: You get 1 day of premium for each referral!
referral_reward: Congrats! Someone joined using your referral link. You got 1 day of premium!
